title: Household Governance and Coordination During Temporary Vulnerability
description: As a person rebuilding household stability after crisis I want tools to coordinate household operations and children's needs So that I can provide good care despite overwhelming constraints and create new stability
content:
Feature: Household Governance and Coordination During Temporary Vulnerability
  As a person rebuilding household stability after crisis
  I want tools to coordinate household operations and children's needs
  So that I can provide good care despite overwhelming constraints and create new stability

  Background:
    Given I am managing a household in crisis or transition
    And I am coordinating children's needs amid instability
    And my household resources are severely constrained
    And I am using the Value Scanner to manage household complexity

  Scenario: Managing catastrophically tight household budget
    Given I have temporary assistance, unreliable child support, and no employment yet
    And I need to provide for two children on insufficient resources
    When I plan household spending for the month
    Then the Value Scanner helps me allocate resources across competing needs
    And prioritizes nutrition, safety, and children's essential needs
    And surfaces local resources and assistance I might be eligible for
    And helps me track spending without shame or judgment
    And identifies where I can optimize without sacrificing children's wellbeing
    And my personal_agent alerts me to upcoming expenses before they become crises
    And recognizes my resource management as sophisticated financial labor
    And validates that I'm making the best possible choices under extreme constraint

  Scenario: Coordinating children's basic needs amid housing instability
    Given I am in transitional housing with uncertain future
    And my children need stability, routine, and predictability
    When I plan daily and weekly household operations
    Then the Value Scanner helps me maintain consistency where possible
    And tracks children's schedules, needs, and preferences
    And helps me create portable routines that work across housing changes
    And surfaces strategies for stability even in unstable circumstances
    And coordinates meal planning with catastrophically limited budget
    And my personal_agent reminds me of important household tasks
    And recognizes my household management as substantial care work
    And celebrates the stability I'm providing under impossible conditions

  Scenario: Creating new household norms and governance after leaving abuse
    Given my household previously operated under abusive dynamics
    And I am rebuilding household culture based on safety and respect
    When I establish new household rules and norms
    Then the Value Scanner supports my authority as household decision-maker
    And helps me create age-appropriate structures for children
    And documents household agreements and expectations
    And tracks what's working and what needs adjustment
    And provides resources on healthy household dynamics
    And my personal_agent reminds household members of established norms
    And validates that rebuilding takes time and iteration
    And recognizes my household governance work as valuable labor

  Scenario: Managing children's trauma responses and behavioral challenges
    Given my children are exhibiting trauma responses from abuse and instability
    And I am also traumatized and resource-depleted
    When challenging behaviors arise in household
    Then the Value Scanner helps me track patterns and triggers
    And surfaces trauma-informed parenting strategies
    And connects me to appropriate support services for children
    And validates that these challenges are normal responses to abnormal circumstances
    And helps me maintain patience and compassion despite stress
    And my personal_agent provides in-the-moment coaching when I'm struggling
    And documents my sophisticated trauma-responsive parenting
    And recognizes this emotional labor as substantial care contribution

  Scenario: Coordinating household operations while navigating legal system
    Given I have family court hearings, protective order renewals, and legal appointments
    And household operations must continue despite legal demands
    When I manage competing priorities of legal navigation and household needs
    Then the Value Scanner coordinates across both domains
    And ensures children's needs don't fall through cracks during legal crisis
    And tracks legal deadlines without letting household management suffer
    And helps me prepare for legal events while maintaining household stability
    And my personal_agent balances urgent legal tasks with ongoing household care
    And surfaces support for children during particularly stressful legal periods
    And recognizes that managing both is extraordinary organizational labor
    And prevents either domain from overwhelming the other

  Scenario: Maintaining children's nutrition on catastrophically limited food budget
    Given I have approximately $X per week for groceries
    And I need to provide nutritious meals for growing children
    When I plan household meals and shopping
    Then the Value Scanner helps me maximize nutrition within extreme constraints
    And surfaces local food assistance programs and resources
    And provides meal planning that works with my cooking capacity and time
    And helps me navigate food pantries and assistance with dignity
    And tracks children's nutritional needs and preferences
    And my personal_agent suggests creative solutions for healthy eating on no money
    And recognizes my food provision as sophisticated care economy work
    And validates that feeding children well under these constraints is remarkable achievement

  Scenario: Managing household during crisis transitions (shelter to housing, housing to housing)
    Given I am moving from transitional housing to permanent housing
    And household operations must continue during major disruption
    When I coordinate the moving transition
    Then the Value Scanner helps me manage transition logistics
    And maintains children's routines as much as possible during chaos
    And tracks what needs to happen when (utilities, school transfers, address changes)
    And helps me coordinate assistance with moving
    And ensures essential household functions continue uninterrupted
    And my personal_agent prevents critical tasks from being forgotten
    And recognizes transition management as substantial invisible labor
    And celebrates successful navigation of major household disruption

  Scenario: Coordinating household responsibilities with children age-appropriately
    Given I need age-appropriate help from children with household tasks
    And I want to avoid parentifying children or burdening them inappropriately
    When I assign household responsibilities
    Then the Value Scanner helps me identify appropriate contributions for each child's age
    And ensures children contribute without bearing adult burdens
    And tracks household task completion and distributes fairly
    And validates children's contributions with care token recognition
    And helps me balance children's help with their need to be children
    And my personal_agent reminds children of tasks without nagging
    And recognizes my calibration of appropriate responsibility as sophisticated parenting
    And supports healthy household participation for all members

  Scenario: Managing household privacy and safety boundaries
    Given I have safety concerns about my abuser finding me
    And household information could compromise our safety
    When I manage household information sharing
    Then the Value Scanner helps me control what information exists about household location
    And supports necessary anonymity with service providers
    And helps me teach children appropriate privacy practices
    And tracks who has what information about our household
    And alerts me to potential privacy/safety breaches
    And my personal_agent reminds me of safety protocols
    And recognizes that managing safety is constant cognitive and emotional labor
    And validates that my vigilance is appropriate and necessary

  Scenario: Rebuilding household material stability after losing everything
    Given I left my previous household with minimal possessions
    And I am rebuilding household from nearly nothing
    When I work to acquire essential household items
    Then the Value Scanner helps me prioritize what household needs most urgently
    And connects me to resources for furniture, household goods, children's items
    And tracks what I have and what I still need
    And helps me access assistance without stigma
    And coordinates donations and support from community networks
    And my personal_agent surfaces opportunities for needed items
    And recognizes household rebuilding as substantial productive labor
    And celebrates each step toward material stability

  Scenario: Managing household energy and time amid extreme depletion
    Given I am traumatized, stressed, and exhausted
    And household operations require consistent energy and attention
    When I allocate my limited capacity across household demands
    Then the Value Scanner helps me identify what's truly essential vs. what can wait
    And provides realistic expectations for what's achievable in my state
    And suggests efficiency strategies that reduce cognitive load
    And validates that "good enough" is genuinely good enough right now
    And helps me ask for and coordinate household help
    And my personal_agent prevents me from over-committing my depleted resources
    And recognizes that managing household while traumatized is extraordinary
    And celebrates my household care work under extreme constraint

  Scenario: Creating household stability and joy amid ongoing crisis
    Given my children need not just survival but moments of normalcy and happiness
    And resources for "extras" are nonexistent
    When I try to create positive household experiences
    Then the Value Scanner helps me identify low-cost/no-cost ways to create joy
    And surfaces community resources for children's activities and experiences
    And helps me maintain household traditions and celebrations
    And reminds me that emotional presence matters more than material provision
    And tracks moments of household happiness and connection
    And my personal_agent suggests activities that fit our constraints
    And recognizes emotional care work as valuable as material provision
    And validates that I am providing good childhood despite circumstances
